noviceHybridAbilitiesDescription: These are hybrid abilities that require your [SPELL LEVEL] and [MARTIAL LEVEL] to be above 0.

elementalHybridAbilities.description: You summon dark energy from the Aether and engulf ta 4.5m sphere in complete darkness. Only magical light of a higher spell power than this can illuminate this area and even creatures with darkvision can not see in this area.
